item.title: New Month New Year New Problems
item.description: After charging our old lead acid batteries, I rebooted the inverter only for it to fail, so no electricity. Mario was good enough to come over after work and told us the bad news, we need a new inverter â‚¬1500.00 later and an inverter was ordered. New Panels in situ
